flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
name: Imp Gang Boss
howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
